endemo2.model_instance.model.households.hh_subsectors module

class HotWater(country_name, subsector_id, hh_if)[source]

Bases: HouseholdsSubsector

This class specifies the calculation per equation for the hot water subsector in the households sector.

Variables:

  • _country_name (str) – The name of the country this subsector belongs to.

  • _subsector_name (str) – The name of the subsector.

  • _cts_if (CtsInstanceFilter) – The instance filter of the cts sector.

Parameters:

  • country_name (str) –

  • subsector_id (HouseholdsSubsectorId) –

  • hh_if (HouseholdsInstanceFilter) –

endemo2.model_instance.model.households.household_sector module

class Households(country_name, households_instance_filter)[source]

Bases: Sector

The CommercialTradeServices class represents the cts sector of one country. It holds als subsectors.

Variables:

  • _country_name (str) – Name of the country this sector is located in.

  • _hh_if (HouseholdsInstanceFilter) – The instance filter for the households sector.

  • _subsectors (dict[str, HouseholdsSubsector]) – All subsectors in this cts sector.

Parameters:

  • country_name (str) –

  • households_instance_filter (HouseholdsInstanceFilter) –

calculate_demand()[source]

Calculate demand of the households sector.

Return type:

Demand

Returns:

The demand summed over all _subsectors in this households sector.

calculate_demand_distributed_by_nuts2()[source]

Calculate demand distributed by nuts2 regions.

Return type:

dict[str, Demand]

Returns:

The demand summed over all subsector in this households sector, split by nuts2 regions.

calculate_hourly_demand_efh()[source]

Calculate the hourly demand for the single person households in this sector.

Return type:

dict[DemandType, [<class ‘float’>]]

Returns:

The hourly demand in a list in order by demand type.
